description: This Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) is for the supply and delivery of wardrobe and shipping cartons as required by the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), Training Academy, Depot Division located in Regina, Saskatchewan. The Wardrobe and shipping cartons are supplied to graduating cadets of the RCMP Depot Division Training Academy, for the ability to ship their personal belongings to their RCMP placements across Canada.

full_summary:
### Wardrobe and Shipping Cartons - Standing Offer **Solicitation Number:** M9424-23-0917/A
**Procurement Category:** Good and Services
**Region of Work:** World
**Region of Delivery:** Saskatchewan ### Description The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply and delivery of wardrobe and shipping cartons. The contractor must provide the necessary goods to the RCMP's Training Academy, located in Regina, Saskatchewan, for distribution to graduating cadets ahead of their deployment across Canada. **Key Details** * Supply and delivery of wardrobe and shipping cartons * One-year initial contract with optional extensions for two additional one-year periods * Goods to be delivered within six weeks of contract award * Selection based on compliance with the RISO requirements and technical evaluation criteria ### Contract Documents Reference the attached documents for additional information on the solicitation. Documents can be downloaded through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities). ### Federal Accountability Please note that Canada has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. All tenderers must comply with the recent procurement reviews and decisions made by Public Services and Procurement Canada in relation to this solicitation. ### Government Business Directory The Federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for businesses to register and increase their visibility to access federal government contracts. This solicitation aligns with the government's commitments to Indigenous peoples. ### Delivery Timeline **Tender Submission Deadline:** April 4, 2023, 16:00 hours **Delivery of Goods:** Within six weeks of contract award ### Contact Information * Lianne Hopkie * Agente principale d’approvisionnement * Procurement and Contracting Unit * RCMP Academy Depot Division * 5600-11th Ave, Regina, SK S4P 3J7 * [lian-ne.hopkie@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:lian-ne.hopkie@rcmp-grc.gc.ca) * 639-625-3630 ### Tendering Process This solicitation is conducted through an open televised bidding process, and only offers received and submitted in accordance with the requirements outlined within this file will be considered.
